basics.name: Huy Phat
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: For 3+ years I have kept challenging myself with cutting-edge languages and frameworks.My concentration have always been html, css & javascript but I have also worked as a full stack js developer creating business web applications. At current company, Biglabs, I am building a ReactJS visualization application. I have also built an AngularJS tenant application and a BackboneJS shopper application. I am interested in full stack javascript development and have recently been experimenting a personal projects with ExpressJS and React. I have been using build tools such as Gulp and Webpack to manage modules, loader, and building tasks. I am using Git to manage code in team.

work.summary: Working as a Front End developer as part of company developing html/css/javascript solutions to integrate with the backend systems for the web applications.
highlights: Building a visualization project using ReactJS, d3, and Webpack from scratch.
Maintaining a tenant web application using AngularJS 1, and RequireJS.
Maintaining a shopper web application using BackboneJS and RequireJS.

work.summary: At Sentifi I was working close with Java team to deliver a web application using AngularJS 1, less and grunt
highlights: Joining an on air project to deliver a financial web application for people concern world market and investment.

work.summary: For start-up SSTech I was a Front End Developer working with AngularJS 1, and Ionic to build a betting website and a sporting news application.
While studying overseas, I worked as a part-time Front End Developer to maintain website layout for Mission college
